00086     public function beforeValidate( $oEvent )
00087     {
00088         //  Handle created stamp
00089         if ( $oEvent->sender->isNewRecord )
00090         {
00091             if ( $this->m_sCreatedColumn && $oEvent->sender->hasAttribute( $this->m_sCreatedColumn ) )
00092                 $this->owner->setAttribute( $this->m_sCreatedColumn, ( null === $this->m_sDateTimeFunction ) ? date('Y-m-d H:i:s') : eval('return ' . $this->m_sDateTimeFunction . ';') );
00093                     
00094             if ( $this->m_sCreatedByColumn && $oEvent->sender->hasAttribute( $this->m_sCreatedByColumn ) && ! $oEvent->sender->getAttribute( $this->m_sCreatedByColumn ) )
00095                 $this->owner->setAttribute( $this->m_sCreatedByColumn, Yii::app()->user->getId() );
00096         }
00097             
00098         //  Handle lmod stamp
00099         if ( $this->m_sLModColumn && $oEvent->sender->hasAttribute( $this->m_sLModColumn ) )
00100                 $this->owner->setAttribute( $this->m_sLModColumn, ( null === $this->m_sDateTimeFunction ) ? date('Y-m-d H:i:s') : eval('return ' . $this->m_sDateTimeFunction . ';') );
00101                 
00102         //  Handle user id stamp
00103         if ( $this->m_sLModByColumn && $oEvent->sender->hasAttribute( $this->m_sLModByColumn ) && ! $oEvent->sender->getAttribute( $this->m_sLModByColumn ) )
00104             $this->owner->setAttribute( $this->m_sLModByColumn, Yii::app()->user->getId() );
00105                 
00106         return parent::beforeValidate( $oEvent );
00107     }

00117     public function showDates()
00118     {
00119         if ( ! $this->owner->isNewRecord ) return CPSHelperBase::showDates( $this->owner, $this->m_sCreatedColumn, $this->m_sLModColumn, 'D M j, Y' );
00120     }
00121     
00131     public function touch( $additionalColumns = null )
00132     {
00133         $_touchValue = ( null === $this->m_sDateTimeFunction ) ? date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s' ) : eval( 'return ' . $this->m_sDateTimeFunction . ';' );
00134         $_updateList = array();
00135         
00136         //  Any other columns to touch?
00137         if ( null !== $additionalColumns )
00138         {
00139             foreach ( CPSHelperBase::makeArray( $additionalColumns ) as $_attribute )
00140             {
00141                 if ( $this->owner->hasAttribute( $_attribute ) )
00142                 {
00143                     $this->owner->setAttribute( $_attribute, $_touchValue );
00144                     $_updateList[] = $_attribute;
00145                 }
00146             }
00147         }
00148         
00149         if ( $this->m_sLModColumn && $this->owner->hasAttribute( $this->m_sLModColumn ) ) 
00150         {
00151             $this->owner->setAttribute( $this->m_sLModColumn, $_touchValue );
00152             $_updateList[] = $this->m_sLModColumn;
00153         }
00154             
00155         //  Only update if and what we've touched...
00156         return count( $_updateList ) ? $this->owner->update( $_updateList ) : true;
00157     }
